message.body: At quiet show at JBs. Stop by if yr in da hood and so inclined.
Ai, thanks... Still under the weather so at home :-(. Sounds lovely tho, enjoy!
Aw. Feel better!
Hey there. How would Thurs be for you to come over?
Phoo, no, I have an art installation opening at 6.... Unless you wanna get together at 10....sorry :-(
Opening? Is it yours? Lets talk soon and figure something out. If not this week maybe next.
Tues or wed? Yes, it's a group show, I brought the giant pony head, nothin fancy :-). Also, we're making Thai food tomorrow if you wanna come!
Maybe tues. Lets talk later. Tomorrow sounds great but my crazy mom is coming over. If i can get her out of here i would love to. Have to see how it goes.
Haha, good luck with the mom.... Talk soon!
Hey, are u busy? Got a sec to chat?
Heya! Yea, I'm here all night, give a ring when ya lke!
Hey there. Got a sec by any chance?
Thanks for invite! Going to russian birthday dinner tonight. Tomorrow might be good. Maybe i will see you at work beforehand?
Workin in nj tomorrow, but hope to see ya in the evenin! Enjoy the Russians!
Totally forgot about last night! So Sorry! What a jerk! Did dinner come out nicely? i work tomorrow and thurs. Hope i see you there.
Aw, sorry you missed it, it was magical. I'm not in again till next tue! Maybe see you then!!
Aw, I'm up the street, sorry I didn't get back to you yesterday!
No prob! Talk soon.
Wanna go to a Piaf cabaret for pifa tonight? If not, maybe brunch tomorrow?
Ooh. Can we chat?
Hey lady! Still wanna brunch?
Oh no!! Bring along a box of tissues...it's almost over! Then you can go back to sweet, pure individualism... No more teams forever!
You going to broad st? I was thinking about going around 5 ish.
I'm headed over with Ed around 4 I think, hit me up when yr there!
Will do.
Here. Watchin SJ. Where you?
Me too! Over on the west side of broad!
Aw, all cell towers jammed! Couldn't get a text thru to you! Whatcha up to now?
Gonna hang in and make some american style tacos. How bout you?
Goin to a bar b q in n phila, if ya feel like headin out!
Sounds tempting but think i should stay in. Thanks though!
From jamie's twitter feed "nothing like walking on a Sunday to write a letter of resignation". Wtf
I know! At the conference she said she would introduce me to people in case i want to do contract work. She never said she was leaving. Wierdo.
Do. Not. Understand. Hope the conference went well! Didja get to leave early?
Ha ha! It was fine I guess. I did leave early. That was good. Thanks for asking. Hope i see you soon. Back to learning about teamwork! Funny because its true.
Haha, excellent
Ai! I'm a flake. I would love to buy ya a graduation drink soon...maybe today? I get back by 1 at the latest!
Yr not a flake! I am lying on sofa with hangover. Thinking about italian market but still just in thinking phase.
I was thinking about a nap and then quickly moved into the actual napping phase...hope the hangover is subsiding! Wanna get brunch with me and char tomorrow? I'm also down to hang this evenin!
I took nap too. Just woke. Ugh. Maybe later on tomorrow. I am going to the lunch with school unfortunately.
Haha....have fun.....give a ring if you need a drink after ;-)
Sounds good!
Yay, congrats! Glad it went well. And good vibes yr way on the living situation...if I can be any help let me know! And let me know when you wanna hang!
Wanna meet at the mudpit? My couch surfer is there. Beer tent is crazy!
Sure.
Where might you be? I am at fuze tent.
Where'd ya sneak off ta?
On My way to the spot we designated.
On bleeahess by mud pit.
Ok. Got it!
Hey you. Got a sec?
Call me in 5!
Did you have to do a sunglass eval during yr internship as a requirement?
Not as a requirement, but I did one
Hmm. I need to get some of those things. I think Jamie totally made up that its a requirement. Not in the handbook and nobody ever mentioned it until sh
e did last week.

Wow. Sounds like it's just a Jamie requirement....it's super easy to do tho..."which is better, a or b?". It shouldn't be a requirement....a child could do it....I might see her tomorrow! Oh, and good luck on comps!!!!!
Thank you! And let me know how it goes if you guys cross paths.
Hey lady! In town? Wanna got brunch/lunch at the nolibs fest tomorrow?
Brunch lunch sounds great! Call me when yr up.
Hey there. Still want some help in the studio on Sat?
Yea! I have Ecfmg in the morning and will be around after that if you wanna swing by!
Sounds good. Call or text when yr done and we will figure out a time.
Yay!
Heya! I'm at the studio now if you still feel like swinging by!
I wonder if getting our hands on some dry ice for the punch bowl would be an option.
Perhaps?
You busy?
Call me in 5!
Hey there. Do you have phone number of John R, our boss? Also, do u think tix will be available at the door on Sat?
Thanks!
No, but i didn't want to bug you too much!
That # came thru, right?
Got it! Thanks!
Sorry, iPhones are weird about sending contacts
Aw, I'm up the street. Wanna grab a drink and catch up after work?
Yes! Lets.
Cool. Hopefully we will finish up at the same time.
Sweet. I have to pick something up there, so I can meetcha at 3624
All done. Outside on a bench. See you soon!
No prob. I will be here.
Whoa! Early! I have two more...if you don't wanna wait, it's fine!
Agh, I mean, I have 1 more
Forgot to send that earlier, sorry...
Oh thats ok. Maybe i will see you at work.
Dang, can't hang tomorrow, forgot I have circus school after class. Sorry!
Thanks. Home for good now! I am up the street tomorrow. Talk soon!
I'm at 3624! Hope the dc is goin well!
On the train...will call when I'm off!
Up to anything this eve?
Hey you. Just hanging in i think. About to eat some chili. How bout you?
Sounds fun but i think its scary movie time. Thanks though!
Goin dancin if ya feel like it!
Ha, enjoy!
Yeah! What time you thinking?
Hey, wanna meet tomorrow for lunch?
Any! I got nuthin to do till 3:30. 1 ish?
Sounds good! Talk late morning and sort out the details?
Damn, I'm utterly ill. Gonna lay low today and recover....sorry :-(
Oh no! Poor thing. Hope you feel better!
Thx!
Wooo, better! Wanna do lunch today?
Mindy's gonna drive. We can caravan from our place, meet at 6? See ya then!
Great! See you then!
Do you have any blank CDs? If so, could you bring me one? Made a mix, but nothing to burn to!
Not sure. If Jacy has some i will be sure to bring!
Yay, no biggie, but thx!
Hey where you guys at?
Getting food and then walking back to the house, peeps are there now!
Great. On our way!
Sorry I didn't txt last night! Tonight is the Halloween cabaret at ruba club, starts at 10:30 if yr feelin like getting some spook on!
Ah hi you! Sorry I missed last night! Would love to come out tonight but just now got home from Beth's. Been there since ten this morn and have not eate
n. Gonna have din and pass out! Thanks for thinking of me. Have a great time! Or break a leg, if thats more approp.
Take care of yrself lady! We'll hang when you get back next week. Thx!
Hey. Near yr house. Feel like getting a beer?
I'm at work :-(. If yr still there in an hour!
Yeah i will stick around.
At Belgian cafe. 21 and Green if you care to join me!
Hey you still going to Eddie's? If so i Can give you a ride.
Maybe 2 or 3. Cant stay late though.
What time you plannin on goin?
Sure. As long as she doesnt mind riding in the junkiest car in Philly.
Ok! Can my friend Kristina come as well?
I will pick you up. Let u know when im thinking about leaving.
Yr car is wonderful! Thanks! Shall I meetcha at yr place or mine?
K!
I dont know. It was scary! She wants me to mail a voided check for direct deposit so maybe thats a good sign. But still not sure. Wont find out for weeks!
How'd it go??????
Are you serious? A voided check? Yr so in!! Congrats!!!
Thanks but i dont know. They are still interviewing people.
Hey. Sorry I missed post thanksgiving. You working tomorrow? Im at 3624. Be nice to see you and catch up.
I'm off :-/ but will be at the meeting Thursday? Yes, it has been too long! I'm also there fri and sat!
See you friday then!
Hey thanks for inviting me tonight. Sorry im not gonna make it. Love the idea of a potato party! Lets try to catch up soon.
Yes please!
Got the job! Found out yesterday.
Yessssssssss!!!!!! Congrats!! I knew you'd get it. Celebratory drink/hang times soon?
Thanks! Hell yeah soon!
Whatcha doin tomorrow? I was maybe gonna go to s Philly for Gwen Rookers bday brunch, maybe we can meet up?
Yeah. Call me. May have hangover too much though. Having people over tonight. Mostly Beth friends. Come by if you can!
Oh I don't want to intrude, but thank you! I was out till 6 am last night, so prolly staying in anyway...I'll give a ring tomorrow!
No intrusion silly! If yr up for it we will be here. If not talk tomorrow.
Awesome possum
Sorry, didn't leave my house all day :-) maybe after work drink Tuesday or Wednesday?
Im sorry too. Was a total bum today. Yeah sounds good for soon.
Huzzah, I'll give ya a buzz after work tues!
Jeremy's not feeling well, so I'm going home for a bit after work, are you busy this evening? Sorry to put it off :-(
Oh no prob! Feeling a bit lazy. Maybe later but if not we can do something soon. You working tomorrow?
At night tomorrow and Thursday, then I'm leaving for ky until the 29th! I'll holla atcha latah!
Sounds good.
I'm heading to nodding head if ya'd care to join!
Would like to but gotta work tomorrow and kinda beat. Thanks though. if I don't see you tomorrow maybe we could meet up thursday during the day.
Sure! I have work thurs night, but before!
Just parked.
K, throwing on clothes and then out the door!
Heya lady! Happy new year! Up to anything tonight? Would you like to come over for dinner?
Aw that's a tempting offer. Think I just need to stay in and lay low though. Maybe some night soon. Hope your holidays were good. Thanks. Talk soon.
Sure sure. I'll stop by with some soup some night this week if you're around. Hope you got to relax a bit with holidays and all, we'll catch up soon!
You are still going to party right? if so what time?
Yes! Prolly 6:30/7. You?
yep. hopefully around the same time. see you there!
Heya! I'd love ta take you out for a drink and hear about yr first week (and everything else in yr life) if yr free later today!
Agh jaycee told a story about someone last night...maybe Wagner? It was an amazing tale and now I can't recall a single bit of it.
Hmm. If you can remember any details I might be able to tell the story. Glad you came out last night!
Man I can't remember a single detail except that it was a really tragic story about a man. My leaky leaky brain! So good to see you too!
I'm perplexed. It wasn't a ghost story about the Khyber was it?
No...it's so weird, it seems like a dream to me. Maybe it was? I think it was real but it's super fuzzy. Don't worry about it!
Ok. Was wondering if it was a dream. How was Baby Snakes? Was Titties and Beer scene as good as I remember? Don't forget about Dagon for one of yr movie
nights! It's not for the squeamish though.
Titties and beer was real awesome :-). And yes! Puttin it on the queue!
Do you wanna go to the pig iron benefit tonight? I have 2 free tickets! 8pm, the troc
Sure!
Awesome! I've either got circus or rehearsal up until then, but I'll meetcha there at 8pm!
Great! Thanks!
Just fyi I'm still waiting on confirmation that I have comps waiting for me, so may have to change plans if they don't come through. But it should!
Ok, confirmed!
Alright! This should be fun!
Yea!
I got a ride home so back much earlier than I thought...wanna head over soon?
Here
Just parked.
You should go see Pina if you get a chance. It's pretty beautiful.
Oh I want to! Thx for the heads up!
Up to anything tonight?
Sorry I missed you! Just saw yr text. In north Jersey visiting a friend. But have been meaning to ask you if you want to go see Kaci's show. Think it's t
he last week and I hope I'm not too late.
Oh yea, I'd love to see kacis show! Any night in particular work for you?
Yikes, looks like the only night that tix are still available for (that I can go to) is Saturday...does that work for you?
Yeah that works. Sorry I didn't get back sooner.
No prob! Ok, Saturday good!
Do you want me to just buy both so we can sit together?
Ooh could you? Will give you cash when I see you and buy you a drink!
Yup yup!
Aw jeeez it's $75!!! Holy schniekies. I don't think I can afford it :-(
Had gone to bed after my last text. That is too much money! I can't afford it either. Oh well.
Let's go do something less expensive then! I'm going to a show at the tritone on thurs, or maybe something Saturday night?
Sat may better cuz I get paid Fri.
Cool! And did you see the post about the free conference in puerto Rico...I was thinking about going! Thought maybe you'd be interested...only $245 round trip!
What? Is that an aer thing? I still have to join. Let's talk about it though!
Yea! I don't think you have to be a member to go, just have to be o&m (not sure about this). We can talk about it on sat!
Hey sorry not to get back to you yesterday, was in rehearsal all night. But yes! I def want to work with any Spanish clientele. I'm going to call tomorrow. Thx!
Is tonight still a plan? It's ok if not. Just wondering if I should get a shower soon.

Hey! Sorry not to txt ya sooner. I'm actually still in NYC, should be back by ten if that's not too late...sorry, I thought I would have been back earlier :-( have a show at Fiume tomorrow if you wanna come to hat too!
Tomorrow may be good. Let me know details. Ten might be tired time tonight.
Yea, so sorry, I bought I got an earlier bus ticket. Tomorrow yes! Show at Fiume with señor papos, let's have a drink before and of you have time you can stay for he show!
Yes! Off Monday.
Oh great! Ok i'll txt ya mañana with a time!
hey any idea what time you might wanna meet up later? Just trying to plan the rest of my day.
Yea! Wanna meet at Fiume around 8/8:30?
sounds good!
Great!
Lessay 8:30, got a lot of prep to do still
K.
Heya! If you can pass on Diane Jackson's # that'd be fantastic. Thx!
Oh yeah! Will do as soon as I get back there.
Thx!
Yay!
And karaoke is going down at the milcreek on Thursday!
Alright! Hope you can go too!
Yea, I'm there!
Yes!
Prolly gonna leave for milcreek around 9/9:30, still down for some karaoke?
Whoa, I fell asleep and just woke up! Forgot about karoke. You headin over? I have mixed feelings about it.
We all do :-) haven't left yet. Let me know what you decide! If you wanna just come over and have a beer that's cool as well!
Wanna chat it out?
Chat it over, I mean.
Still up for happy hour drink?
Yea! Somewhere close... Belgian cafe, prohibition?
Heya! I'm a few blocks away from you at lucky 13 if you wanna grab a drink!
Aw, wish I could. Heading to bed. Big day at Work tomorrow. Too bad! It's a rare treat, an invite so close. Thanks for asking. Have fun!
No prob lovely lady! Have a restful night and a stress free tomorrow!
remember when eddie kicked that manhole cover into the hole? Ah ha ha!
Aw....wish I could go back up there this week! Best magic time ever.
I know! Too bad about Jeremy's show but we will definitely go up again!
If you have a free night this week we have shows every night (Napoleon thing)! I will feed you a chocolate at the show :-)
Ooh, yeah. Maybe tomorrow or thurs? Pass along info please.
Yea! 8pm tomorrow and thurs, Christ church neighborhood house @ 2nd just above market $15. Hope to see you there!
Hey you. Tonight isn't the kind of thing where I'm gonna feel weird if I'm by myself, right?
No! Prolly a good show to see by yrself, you'll just be wandering around getting fed chocolate. But mindy and nora are gonna be there I believe.
Great! See you there!
I didn't make it in. guess it was foolish of me not to reserve. Didn't think of it. Sorry!
My fault, I didn't realize it was sold out :-( so sorry,.....I owe you a drink fer sure.
You don't owe me a drink silly. Sorry I missed it. Are you going to AER conference?
The puerto Rico? I still haven't gotten in touch with the guy, still kinda toying with the idea though...cdid they say you could go?
No. I meant the Harrisburg one. I know they won't go for Puerto Rico and if I have to take vacation days and pay for all, think I'd rather take vacation.
For sure. No I'm not going to spring vision....think I probably passed the beta test so I don't have to do any continuing Ed
Wow! I gotta get on that! Too bad 4 me that yr not going. Was gonna offer you to stay in my room.
Aw, thank you! You wanna get brunch tomorrow?
Yes!
Cool! I've been wanting to go to the trestle inn on 11th around callowhill, but I'm down to come closer to you if that works best for you!
The trestle? Isn't that a strip bar? Sure! If they do brunch I'm in! I also want to try Sazon on 10th and spring garden some time.
Yea, they have brunch on weekends apparently. But I love Sazon! Let's go there, and drink all kinds of mad hot chocolate.
Ok! The other sounds fun too, so we have to do that next time.
Yesyes! Let's do 11? I'll also be at a house party tonight in south Philly if you wanna come out!
Yeah, let me know! And eleven sounds good.
Great!
Hey, can we push brunch up an hour? I wasn't thinking about the clock change.
Nope ... :-( maybe best to put it off, I got asked to fill in for someone in a show and have to leave here at noon. Sorry!
Oh well. That's ok. Guess even if we met soon it wouldn't be enough time. We can make a new plan soon.
Yea, all the places I know don't even open till 11, or I would gave said meet earlier. New plan soon!

Ugh, I all kindsa messed up. I forgot to txt you last night! Agh! So sorry....I'm juggling a few unexpected things right now and am totally scatterbrained. I owe you big time brunch in 2 weeks. I'm also going to see a free show w free beer at 7 tonight if
That's no big deal about last night! You don't owe me brunch silly. Can't tonight cuz I'm going to an accessibility workshop at the Apple store. We'll ge
t it together soon enough.
For reals! I'll be super busy next two weeks since I picked up this show, but soon!
I miss ECFMG. Hope yr doing well. I wanna sit outside at llama tooth sometime.
Aw. Ec misses you too. I've been crazy busy, but things are starting to calm down. How about Thursday when yr off? If not, I can do Sunday brunch!
Anytime. No rush. We can wait til show is over. Should I go to it, btw? Also, when u have time, put yr stuff in here. May be lifting moratorium on contra
cting. I hear Jamie wants to do it. Put in a good word for you and yr Spanish.

Thursday is good! I have to meet with rob later that evening, but def have time for a few drinks at 5 if you wanna! And the show is bad, so no :-) but next weeks show I'm in is a punk rock cabaret, that should be awesome! And yay contracting! Diane said s
Thursday it is!
Huzzah! Just let me know when yr headed over and i''ll meetcha there!
We still on for later?
Yea!
Just got some info concerning you and Jamie. Totally unsolicited.
? Que?? Oh man. I'm at work so can't really call...let me know when ya can
Call me whenever. Maybe I'll try you on my break around 3.
Yea, I should be off then, thx

Haha. Thank you an unbelievable amount for being so supportive....really means a lot to me. It's super frustrating, and I'm still not sure how to address it. I'd love to catch up with you either Sunday or sometime next week and talk more about what I shou
Omg, no thanks necessary. You're my friend! Having a couple people for dinner on Sunday. Yr welcome to come or we can meet up beforehand. Or any day next
week. And don't worry! I really think Moira is as far as it went.
Thanks, I hope so. I'll give you a ring on Sunday, maybe we can grab a coffee at b2 before you gotta cook. You rock.
Sounds good. I can meet you up your way too. And thanks! You know I think the same of you.
I'm around today if you still wanna meet up. Just let me know a little ahead of time so I can take a shower.
Great! I'm just getting up, maybe meet at b2 around 12:30/1?
What's Jamie's bf's last name? Got an email from a Jamie L something at salus. Not sure if it's her.
Gibbon. I don't think she's taken his name? But who knows.
Must be someone else. It's about joining alumni group.
Yea, doubt it's her
Happy Easter! Say, I totally forgot about taxes. Can you still do em?
Ha, my bad! Yes, totally. Can meet you today, if yr not doin family stuff, have work tomorrow and tues night, Wednesday I have off. When ever works for you!
Thanks! At dad's now. Jacy and I have filled a 20 yard dumpster with lots more work to do! Any evening this week is good for me.
Wowza. Good luck!! If you wanna meet after ten tomorrow I can do that. Any earlier and it'd have to be Wednesday
Would wed give you enough time before the 15th? If so, that would be better for me. Also, I get an hour for lunch and could meet up then. Usually winding
down for bed by 10 but if that would be best for you, no problem.
Lunch break tomorrow? What time and where?
12 to one is my break. Just leaving my dad's. Exhausted! I don't have my papers together. Any chance we could meet Tues? If they're a few days late I don
't care. But if you'd much prefer tomorrow, I can do it.
No, tues or wed is fine! It shouldn't take me that long
Wanna meet up in nolibs for drink/tax hostage exchange tomorrow when yr off?
I can't find my papers for the Ed credit!
Oh no! You need that. Can you call them and have it sent again? I can do the rest and plug it in at the last min
Aargh! Can't find it. I suspect Jacy accidentally threw it out. Of course, they are not answering the phone at the salus bursar office. God damn it! Migh
t have to file extension.
Ok, just let me know!
Ok. Sorry!
No probs!
Hey, how's it going? Still planning to see the screening tonight?
Yea! Wanna go?
Think so. Wanna get food and drink before? I work til 5.
I have circus so will have to go straight from that to the movie, lamecakes. Thanks tho!
Hmm. What time is movie again, and where?
7, at 309 cherry
Maybe see you. Thanks!
Ok, hope to see you then! Gettin started on yr taxes soon so may txt you with questions
K!
You want to file as a jersey resident, yes?
Yes please.
Dob?
Zomg! Bday times next week! What shall we do for celebration?
Ha ha! Thanks! ! Anything would be good!
How much was yr rent for dc? Did you have any expenses other than gas associated with that job?
600 per month, at least. Can't really think of other expenses. Got reimbursed for gas. They accidentally included that money in w2, but that's ok.
You spent no $ on books right? Right now you owe $90 federal, not sure on state.
Sweet! I never even do state. Up to you if you wanna. And yeah, no $ on books. Thanks!
I can fudge and say you had related expenses and get you down to 0, but you'd be in trouble if you got audited. Shall I or no?
Umm, don't know. Call u in 2 mins.
K
Can't get it below $41, sorry. Let's meet tonight no matter what, I'll give you yr forms to mail in with a check
Ok, and thank you!
Gonna head over soon, wanna join?
Think so. Just ordered another cocktail though. call u when im leaving.
Any chance you wanna get a drink at standard tap after work?
Probably! I'm looking at some spaces, but I should be done by then I think...
Just lemme know when yr headed over and I'll letcha know my eta!
Great!
On my way from up north. Maybe half hour.
Gah, ran into luigi randomly and am now drinking with him...wanna come down here? At resurection
Where dat?
Grays ferry and Catherine
Maybe later. Call u when I leave here.
K! Sorry!
Sorry for delay. No prob! It was a last minute idea anyway. In Collingswood now. Talk soon!
Sorry it didn't work out! We'll hang soon!
Man. I am so sorry I've been so unavailable. I've been so crazy busy lately. You around at all this weekend?
Yeah, coming tonight!
Yay!
Hey, is there a charge to get in? Just wondering how much cash to bring.
It's donation. But there will be beer for sale, and we will be raffling silly things and so on!
Great!
Heya! We're having a graduation garden party for Jeremy today if you wanna come after work! Gonna grill and have drinks n stuff, come come!
Sounds fun. Got back from work trip last night and haven't been to the gym in days. Also, BC coming back from England for visit today. How late you think
you might be going?
For a while! Just give a buzz if you get some time, no worries!
But for the record, garden party > gym :-)
Hey! I'm in rehearsal all night, will try to give you a call back during a break! But might have to call you tomorrow during the day!
Ok, great! No big deal though. At your leisure.
Could we start our own practice? I have a friend who has offered to advise.
Um, maybe? Let's talk when I get back in town, I'll be home on Monday
K. Have fun!
Heya! I'm all settled in back in town, wanna grab a drink after work today or tomorrow?
Welcome back! How was it? How bout tomorrow? Kinda tired today.
Sure! Just give me a buzz when yr off! Tour went splendidly, thx!
Will do!
Done my business. Got us a table.
The baby pepper plants I wanna give you are the variety Numex Twilight. They are edible and hot. And quite attractive. You should look it up when you get
a chance. Thanks for garden time last night! I love it there!
Yea! I am excited for spicy times. Will look em up when I get home! And thx for hanging, twas a truly lovely eve!
You bet your garden is On 90.1
Gah, I was just getting out of bed. So lazy. Those peppers look like Christmas ornaments!!
Wasps are coming and eating the cabbage worms On my kale! Thank you nature!
Ha, nature wants you to have delicious kale! Turns out my beet is really pretty on the inside, spirals of white and pink!
Wow! I love this stuff!
Heya! Wanna come have dinner in the garden tomorrow?
Damn! In Johnstown, pa for work til Friday. Too bad, I love that place! And your company, of course.
Aw. No worries, it will happen again soon!
Hey, don't think I can make it today. Running behind. Have fun and talk soon!
No prob! See ya soon!
Birthday tubing next Sunday! Hope you can come!
Awesome!! The 15? If so I'm there!

Yay! Leavin around 9:30 from Berks and front. We can buy tubes on the way down if you don't have one. Also, would you want to drive? We've got the van but need one more vehicle. If not, no worries, I think Mindy can!
My car hasn't been doing so hot in the heat. I could prob drive though. Not this Sun but next, right? And yes, I will need a tube. Let's talk soon...
No prob! I'll ask mindy. Doin anything for 1st Friday? I'll be down Italian mkt area around 10 for a show
Guided by Voices at the Troc. I'll text and see if yr still around when I get home.
Noice! Have fun!
Wanna come drink some gin at our place b4 the show? Our friend James si in town
Shit, was just gonna text you to see if you wanted to join me at Johnny brendas. My friend is on her way to pick me up at my house. How long is he here?
Till Sunday! We could maybe come there, let me confer with the group. You guys are welcome to stop here on the way too!
K! See what she says and let you know.
On my way to yr house for a quick one! Can't stay but wanna see you!
Yay!
Thanks for having us over! Love you guys!
Thanks for coming!
I think tubing is out tomorrow cause of rain. Poo. Rain date! July 28th!
Aw man! Crappy.
Toob is back on! Agh!
I hope you can still come!! Sorry for the back and forth!
Hey, how was it?
The best!!! So sorry you missed it. I am going out of town to Nebraska Thursday (was going for j's sisters wedding but it just got canceled...drama), but maybe we could do happy hour Wednesday?
Yikes. Yes, Wednesday! Glad you had fun!
Not so sure about happy hour now. It's stupid hot out. What do you think?
Yea, I gotta lotta stuff to do, if you don't mind a rain check...
Yeah. Let's do it when you get back! Have a good trip!
Thx!
Hey, where can a person buy tubes, btw. Target? Going camping this weekend.
